messages.subject: math / card games
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Thanks so much for that idea of that card game.  I recently went to Foxwoods casino with my mom and sister and I played a table similar to your card
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Thanks so much for that idea of that card game. I recently went to
Foxwoods casino with my mom and sister and I played a table similar
to your card game (with 11 or 21). I can't wait to play tomorrow
because it's one of those fun games you can play with ALL AGES. I
can't wait - I even have a bunch of change. We can put the tree up
and then gamble all day while learning math LOL................
now thats what I call unschooling. Oh I forgot my oldest (15) asked
me to ear candle his ears so we will get a little health in there
too.
Thanks for all your ideas Pam :)
Sonya
